DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , open control trial naïve HIV-1 patient randomize receive atazanavir / ritonavir darunavir / ritonavir combination tenofovir / emtricitabine . They follow 96 week determinate cholesterol level . Randomization stratify accord value ratio total cholesterol/HDL cholesterol obtain screen visit ( < 4.5 ≥ 4.5 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Effects Atazanavir/Ritonavir Versus Darunavir/Ritonavir Combination With Tenofovir/Emtricitabine naïve HIV-1 Infected Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients sex age 18 year . Women childbearing potential must commit sexual abstinence use barrier contraceptive method study . 2 . Diagnosis infection HIV1 ( accord standard diagnostic criterion ) 3 . Not previously treat antiretroviral drug 4 . Plasma viral load > = 1000 copy / ml 5 . Clinically stable patient investigator 's opinion time inclusion 6 . Able meet schedule study visit protocol requirement 7 . Written inform consent participate study undergo test examination entail 1 . ALT , AST level great equal 5 time ULN ( upper limit normal ) 2. serum creatinine level great 2 time ULN 3 . Diabetes Mellitus ( accord clinical / use antidiabetic agent ) 4 . Obesity ( BMI ≥ 30 kg/m2 ) 5 . Use drug may affect lipid / glucose metabolism least 30 day prior inclusion study . 6 . Active opportunistic infection require intravenous treatment 7 . Patients know hypersensitivity product study 8 . Use drug formally contraindicate product information drug study 9 . Contraindication use drug study 10 . Women pregnant lactating time study inclusion anticipate pregnancy followup period provide test
